charges.charge_description: 18:371 Consp. to receive, conceal, buy, sell &; facilitate the transportation, concealment and sale of merchandise imported into the U.S., knowing said merchandise was imported contrary to law. Offense dates: 8/1/96-8/13/96 Penalty: 5 yrs, $250,000 fine and $100 SA (1)

18:545 Receiving, concealing, selling &; facilitating the transportation, concealment &; sale of merchandise imported into the U.S., knowing said merchandise to have been imported contrary to law. Offense dates: 8/7/96, 8/11/96, 8/13/96 Penalty: 5 yrs, $250,000 fine, $100 SA as to ea ct. (2-3)

42:7413 Violating a requirement of a Clean Air Act rule by importing an ozone-depleting controlled substance (CFC-12 or Freon) into the U.S. during a control period w/o holding an essential-use allowance or exemption in violation of 40 CFR 80.4(d) Offense date: 8/13/96 Penalty: 5 yrs, $250,000 Fine and $100 SA (4)
18:542 Introducing merchandise (CFC-12 or Freon) into commerce of the U.S. by means of a false material statement. Offense date: 8/13/96 Penalty: 2 yrs, $250, 000 Fine and $100 SA (5)

18:545 Receiving, concealing, selling &; facilitating the transportation, concealment &; sale of merchandise imported into the U.S., knowing said merchandise to have been imported contrary to law. Offense dates: 8/7/96, 8/11/96, 8/13/96 Penalty: 5 yrs, $250,000 fine, $100 SA as to ea ct. (6)
